prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon that resembles a futuristic machine with a shiny exterior.
I want a Pokemon that has a metallic body and can generate magnetic fields.
Generate an electric-type Pokemon with a robotic design and unique floating features.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek, circular body and able to hover in the air.
Imagine a creature that combines technology and nature, with distinct magnetic abilities.
Design a metallic Pokemon that has both a cute and intimidating presence.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a high-tech satellite with electric powers.
